imdb.title: Boku no hîrô akademia
imdb.plot: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

episodes.title: OVA: Rescue! Rescue Training!
episodes.plot: Four weeks after the attack on class 1A's rescue practice, the students resumed training. This time, the teachers are injured. They are forced to face the villain all by themselves.

episodes.title: Make It! Do-or-Die Survival Training 1
episodes.plot: In preparation for Class 1-A's Provisional Hero License Exam, Eraser Head decides to give the class a training exercise on disaster rescue, due to previous license exams having a disaster rescue test in most cases.

episodes.title: Make It! Do-or-Die Survival Training 2
episodes.plot: Izuku looks up the elevator shaft and notices that sunlight is pouring in from the top. Momo notes that the elevators only lead to the inside of the first floor, leading Tsuyu to theorize the surface has collapsed.

episodes.title: OVA: HLB
episodes.plot: The "Hero League Baseball" is an organization set-up by several Pro Heroes to allow them the chance to play and compete in their spare time. For this year, the "Orcas", led by Gang Orca, and the "Lionels", led by Shishido, have made it to the finals. Present Mic narrates the game, accompanied by an extremely apathetic Eraser Head.

episodes.title: OVA: Laugh! As If You Are in Hell
episodes.plot: It's been ten months since Izuku en-rolled at U.A. High School, and on top of his regular school work, four days a week he has been continuing his Hero Work-Study at the Endeavor Agency. On one day, they are approached by a police officer, seeking assistance in tracking down a local graffiti artist vandalizing the streets.

episodes.title: A Quiet Beginning
episodes.plot: Using the information Hawks gathered, the heroes and their work study students get ready for an attack on the paranormal liberation front Led by Shigaraki.

episodes.title: Mirko, the No. 5 Hero
episodes.plot: As Endeavor and the others fight the Nomus at the hospital, Mirko goes against Kyudai Garaki's best soldiers, the High-Ends. Meanwhile, Kaminari steels his resolve to save those he cares about and goes to the front line of team Edgeshot.

episodes.title: One's Justice
episodes.plot: Inside Gunga Villa, the Paranormal Liberation Front realizes that they are under attack, and Twice confronts Hawks about his betrayal.

episodes.title: Inheritance
episodes.plot: An enraged Dabi confronts Hawks after Twice's death, meanwhile at the Hospital Endeavor, Eraser head, Crust, Present Mic and X-less finally arrive to help Mirko, who's risking her life to stop Shigaraki's awakening.

episodes.title: The Thrill of Destruction
episodes.plot: The fight against the High-End Nomus in Jaku Hospital continues however they are unaware that Tomura Shigaraki has awakened. Whilst this is happening, Tokoyami flies in to try and save Hawks from Dabi.

episodes.title: Encounter, Part 2
episodes.plot: Gigantomachia and the rest of the Paranormal Liberation Front gain the upper hand at the Gunga Mountain Villa as the newly awakened Tomura Shigaraki finds a new objective; steal One for All from Izuku Midoriya.

episodes.title: Disaster Walker
episodes.plot: The fight against Shigaraki continues while other heroes fight the new Nomus that Shigaraki summoned. While this is happening Team Edgeshot tries to stop Gigantomachia from making it to Jaku City.

episodes.title: League of Villains Vs. U.A. Students
episodes.plot: The pro heroes' defensive net was broken through. Facing the monstrous giant are the U.A. hero course students. Class A and Class B work together to start a big operation to block Gigantomachia.

episodes.title: Katsuki Bakugo: Rising
episodes.plot: As Aizawa seems to be out of the battle, Midoriya tries to keep Shigaraki in the air utilizing all of his quirks. Knowing his limit is near, Bakugo comes up with a plan to help him.

episodes.title: The Ones Within Us
episodes.plot: Shigaraki's attack pierced right through Kacchan. Deku loses himself to his rage and thrust himself to Shigaraki. However, things change suddenly. In the world of One For All, Deku stand against Shigaraki and All For One.

episodes.title: Dabi's Dance
episodes.plot: Toga faces Uraraka. They try to understand each other's motives. Meanwhile at Jaku, Gigantomachia reaches Shigaraki and awaits his orders. Dabi reveals his true identity to Endeavor and Shouto.

episodes.title: Threads of Hope
episodes.plot: As Best Jeanist tries to stop Gigantomachia, the other heroes face several Nomus. Endeavor and Shouto are still in shock by Dabi.

episodes.title: Final Performance
episodes.plot: As Lemillion makes his appearance, everyone gives their best to fight till the end, until All for One takes control over Shigaraki's body and escapes, with the heroes being defeated.

episodes.title: Hellish Hell
episodes.plot: The fierce battle ended with Shigaraki's escape. Many heroes gave up their lives, cities were destroyed, and people lost their homes. People have lost their faith in heroes, and the future and everyone's smiles are starting to disappear.

episodes.title: Tartarus
episodes.plot: While everyone is still recovering from the aftermath, the Paranormal Liberation Front is already plotting another wave of attacks. Their latest target: Tartarus. They seek to free the imprisoned All For One.

episodes.title: The Hellish Todoroki Family, Part 2
episodes.plot: Prisons across Japan were raided. Countless villains escaped. There have been attacks in the cities. The people are living in fear. They are directing their frustration at Endeavor.

episodes.title: The Wrong Way to Put Out a Fire
episodes.plot: Endeavor reflects on his past tumultuous relationship with his wife Rei and his children, in particular, Toya. Toya's body's physical limitations to his powers lead him to deteriorate until all that was left was the supervillain 'Dabi'.

episodes.title: Izuku Midoriya and Tomura Shigaraki
episodes.plot: While Izuku continues to sleep, he is led into the world of One For All. Past generations of wielders share secrets. And then, he is asked: ''Can you kill Tomura Shigaraki?''

episodes.title: Full Power!!
episodes.plot: Muscular arrives and nearly kills Yo Shindo, but not before Deku intervenes and both have a rematch. Prior to this, All Might remembers what had happened inside the hospital when Deku had just woken.

episodes.title: Hired Gun
episodes.plot: The top three heroes continue to face criticism as they deal with jailbreakers and look for hints about All For One and Shigaraki's whereabouts, and Izuku comes across a villain from Tartarus.

episodes.title: The Lovely Lady Nagant
episodes.plot: During Izuku's fight with Lady Nagant, she tells him secrets about hero society that further solidify his resolve to help those who need his help.

episodes.title: Friend
episodes.plot: As Izuku goes off alone in his quest for justice, his classmates realize something is wrong and try to find a way to help him.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Class A
episodes.plot: As Deku tries to run away, Class A draws him back by recounting their memories with him and reminding him of his own words.

episodes.title: A Young Woman's Declaration
episodes.plot: As the evacuees at U.A. voice their dissent, Ochaco speaks up to try and sway them. Onlookers with ties to Izuku try to figure out if it's time for them to speak out, too.

episodes.title: All Hands on Deck! Class 1-A
episodes.plot: The day after Endeavor's climatic battle, Izuku and his classmate take part in a combat training exercise.

episodes.title: Vestiges
episodes.plot: Hawks reveals where his morals lie and Endeavour begins his journey to mend his relationship with his family.

episodes.title: Clash! Class A vs. Class B!
episodes.plot: Class A and Class B are joined by a special guest as they battle it out during their joint combat training.

episodes.title: Make It Happen, Shinso!
episodes.plot: Shinso's developed Quirk in action against Class 1-B as the first team fight kicks off. It's a brawl full of twists and turns, but in the end, it's Class 1-A's teamwork and quick thinking that allows them to triumph.

episodes.title: Operation New Improv Moves
episodes.plot: The continued battles between Classes 1-A and 1-B. Tokoyami's face-off against Shihai Kuroiro and his dark Quirk. Much like Shinso was the focus, this clash features some flashbacks to Tokoyami's time with Hawks.

episodes.title: Foresight
episodes.plot: Separated from her team, Yaoyorozu's leadership skills are put to the test in the second match of the class battles.

episodes.title: Match 3
episodes.plot: In the third match of the class battles, Honenuki leads the Class B team against a well-balanced Class A team.

episodes.title: Match 3 Conclusion
episodes.plot: It's still anybody's game as the third match continues with an endurance battle between Todoroki and Tetsutetsu.

episodes.title: Early Bird!
episodes.plot: Bakugo shows a different side of himself in the fourth team match as the class battles continue.

episodes.title: That Which Is Inherited
episodes.plot: Midoriya and Shinso face off for the first time since the sports festival in the last fight of the class battles.

episodes.title: Our Brawl
episodes.plot: It's an all-out brawl as the last two teams from Class A and Class B fight it out to the finish.

episodes.title: The New Power and All For One
episodes.plot: As the class battles conclude, Midoriya works with All Might and Bakugo on learning more about his new power.

episodes.title: Have a Merry Christmas!
episodes.plot: It's Christmas at U.A. and the Class 1-A students celebrate with a Christmas party.

episodes.title: Off to Endeavor's Agency!
episodes.plot: Deku, Bakugo and Todoroki arrive at Endeavor's agency for their Hero Work Studies. Meanwhile, Hawks informs Endeavor about the Meta Liberation Army.

episodes.title: One Thing at a Time
episodes.plot: As the villains continue to move behind the scenes, Endeavor helps his work-study students with the next steps in their training.

episodes.title: Long Time No See, Selkie
episodes.plot: Ryukyu brings her work study students with her when Selkie asks her to team up with him.

episodes.title: The Hellish Todoroki Family
episodes.plot: Endeavour reflects on his past actions towards his family members before taking his work studies student trio to the Todoroki household for an awkward family dinner.

episodes.title: The Unforgiven
episodes.plot: Endeavour's estranged son Natsu is kidnapped by Endeavour's previous foe "Ending" who has the most psychotic of motivations. It is up to Endeavour and the work studies trio to try and save Natsu and defeat "Ending".

episodes.title: More of a Hero Than Anyone
episodes.plot: Eraser Head and Present Mic take a trip to Tartus prison and meet face to face with Kurogiri and his dark past.

episodes.title: My Villain Academia
episodes.plot: A series of surprise encounters helps give Shigaraki a new sense of direction for the villains.

episodes.title: Revival Party
episodes.plot: The League of Villains waits for Gigantomachia to wake up as they clash with the Meta Liberation Army.

episodes.title: Sad Man's Parade
episodes.plot: Twice watches helplessly as the puppets try to kill Toga. To save her, Twice overcomes his trauma and unleashes a formidable power

episodes.title: Tenko Shimura: Origin
episodes.plot: As the battle between Shigaraki and Re-Destro rages on, Shigaraki begins to remember his past.

episodes.title: Tomura Shigaraki: Origin
episodes.plot: While he battles Re-Destro and awakens his true powers, the origin of Tomura Shigaraki is revealed.

episodes.title: The High, Deep Blue Sky
episodes.plot: Meanwhile, All Might talks Deku about One For All that it has a New Quirk, but someone has a True Plan.

episodes.title: The Scoop on U.A. Class 1-A
episodes.plot: After All Might announces his retirement, freelance reporter Taneo Tokuda goes to the dorms to investigate U.A. Class 1-A.

episodes.title: Overhaul
episodes.plot: The villain known as Overhaul meets with Shigaraki in order to propose an alliance that ends badly for the two sides. Meanwhile, Izuku continues to think about where he wants to intern and gets a tip from Togata.

episodes.title: Boy Meets...
episodes.plot: Izuku battles Sir Nighteye so he can do his work study at Nighteye's agency, but Nighteye has someone else in mind to be All Might's successor.

episodes.title: Fighting Fate
episodes.plot: Izuku's first day on patrol takes a shocking turn where he meets Chisaki and a mysterious girl. Later, he decides to confront All Might about the truth surrounding One for All's successor.

episodes.title: Let's Go, Gutsy Red Riot
episodes.plot: Kirishima begins his work study with Fat Gum and Amajiki and runs into a criminal situation. Meanwhile, Shigaraki and Chisaki meet up in order to discuss an alliance.

episodes.title: An Unpleasant Talk
episodes.plot: Pro heroes from all across the country meet up to discuss the situation with the Shie Hassaikai, including the U.A students. The discussion takes a shocking turn when a horrible truth is revealed about the girl named Eri.

episodes.title: GO!!
episodes.plot: To save Eri and to stop the machinations of the Hassaikai Group, the pro heroes prepare to mount an all out attack on the bad guys' stronghold. Deku and Togata steel themselves for the battle ahead.

episodes.title: Suneater of the Big Three
episodes.plot: The Shie Hassaikai is going all out to stop the heroes, and Suneater volunteers to take out the first batch of Eight Bullets members in their way.

episodes.title: Red Riot
episodes.plot: As the fight with the Shie Hassaikai continues, Kirishima has to face his past when he and Fat Gum get separated from the others.

episodes.title: Temp Squad
episodes.plot: Still fused with the walls and floors, Irinaka continues to separate the heroes and police attacking the Hassaikai. Toga and Twice continue to assist the yakuza as part of a deal with Shigaraki, however..

episodes.title: Lemillion
episodes.plot: Twice and Toga betray the Shie Hassasaki meanwhile Mirio finally catches up to Overhaul and Chrono.

episodes.title: Unforeseen Hope
episodes.plot: Izuku, Eraser Head, and Sir Nighteye finally reach the area where Chisaki and the others are and find Togata past his limit.

episodes.title: Infinite 100%
episodes.plot: Despite their efforts, Overhaul has only grown stronger. Nighteye and Mirio are too injured to continue fighting. Aizawa has been incapacitated by Chrono. The raid team is in shambles, with few left standing. But Eri is crying, and this time, Deku will not let go.

episodes.title: Bright Future
episodes.plot: As the heroes deal with the aftermath of the fight with the Shie Hassaikai, the vehicle transporting Chisaki has an encounter with the League of Villains.

episodes.title: Smoldering Flames
episodes.plot: Our fight with the Shie Hassaikai has ended and we were able to change the future. But it wasn't completely over yet. As we overcome, with grief at the loss of Sir Nighteye, the league of Villains started to move towards a new stage.

episodes.title: Win Those Kids' Hearts
episodes.plot: Camie joins the provisional license training course and is added to the team working with the kids from Masegaki. Meanwhile, Endeavor has a serious talk with All Might.

episodes.title: Relief for License Trainees
episodes.plot: The trainees bond with the precocious Masegaki kids and life at U.A. goes back to normal as autumn approaches, but Aoyama has been acting strangely.

episodes.title: School Festival
episodes.plot: As the students of U.A prepare for their school festival, Deku and Togata visit Eri in the hospital. Meanwhile, a new villain named Gentle Criminal begins his reign of crime.

episodes.title: Prepping for the School Festival is the Funnest Part
episodes.plot: As the date of the school festival draws nearer, Deku and the rest of Class 1-A decide who is going to do what in order to put on the greatest school festival ever.

episodes.title: Golden Tips Imperial
episodes.plot: The day of the festival is at hand and Class 1-A is ready. As they relax on the night before, Gentle Criminal hatches his plan to infiltrate the festival, starting with a very special tea.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Gentle Criminal
episodes.plot: While getting something for the festival, Deku runs into Gentle Criminal. Learning that he plans to infiltrate the festival, Deku begins to fight the mysterious villain and his partner La Brava.

episodes.title: School Festival Start!
episodes.plot: Deku scrambles to stop Gentle Criminal from infiltrating U.A's school festival using his Shoot Style technique. As La Brava uses her Quirk to power up Gentle, his resolve hardens as he fights against Deku.

episodes.title: Let it Flow! School Festival!
episodes.plot: Izuku rushes back to the school festival after his encounter with Gentle Criminal and La Brava, but will he make it in time for his performance?

episodes.title: Japanese Hero Billboard Chart
episodes.plot: It's time for the next Japanese Hero Billboard Chart rankings to be announced, and this time, all the top ten heroes make an appearance.

episodes.title: His Start
episodes.plot: Endeavor and Hawks continue to battle the mysterious Nomu enemy that attacked them. As they scramble to stop the villain and save the people, the whole world watches what the new "Symbol of Peace" is capable of.

episodes.title: Game Start
episodes.plot: A recap episode highlighting the first 2 seasons as Class-1A and Class-1B prepare to start summer camp.

episodes.title: Wild, Wild Pussycats
episodes.plot: The kids arrive at camp, where they will be subjected to hard work like they've never experienced before.

episodes.title: Kota
episodes.plot: Midoriya finds out more about Kota and why he feels so strongly about heroes as a small but competent group of villains threaten to endanger the lives of everyone in the camp.

episodes.title: My Hero
episodes.plot: The villains launch their attack, and only Izuku knows where Kota is. Can he get to him in time?

episodes.title: Drive It Home, Iron Fist!!!
episodes.plot: As the students and teachers retaliate against the villains, two students take it into their own hands to handle the unknown gas swirling across the forest.

episodes.title: Roaring Upheaval
episodes.plot: The students and teachers of U.A. are still fighting in the woods, but has the Vanguard Action Squad accomplished its mission already...?.

episodes.title: What a Twist!
episodes.plot: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer...

episodes.title: From Iida to Midoriya
episodes.plot: Todoroki, Kirishima, and Midoriya want to go after Bakugo, but the class rep is standing in their way. Meanwhile, Shigaraki makes Bakugo an offer...

episodes.title: All for One
episodes.plot: The heroes and U.A. students close in on the League of Villains' hideouts, but the League still has an ace up its sleeve.

episodes.title: Symbol of Peace
episodes.plot: As the fight against the League of Villains escalates, can the U.A. students get Bakugo out in time for All Might to make a big comeback?

episodes.title: One For All
episodes.plot: All Might's time is running out as he faces his ultimate nemesis head on. Will he finally be able to defeat All For One once and for all?

episodes.title: End of the Beginning, Beginning of the End
episodes.plot: Students and faculty react to the fallout of All Might and All for One's confrontation.

episodes.title: Moving into Dorms
episodes.plot: The students of Class 1-A move into the dorms and have a competition to determine who has the best room as they settle in.

episodes.title: Create Those Ultimate Moves
episodes.plot: Class 1-A works on developing their Quirks and creating ultimate moves in order to get ready for the provisional hero licensing exam.

episodes.title: The Test
episodes.plot: Izuku and his classmates make some final adjustments to their ultimate moves and then head off to the provisional licensing exam.

episodes.title: Shiketsu High Lurking
episodes.plot: The provisional licensing exam has begun, and everyone's after Class 1-A. Can they last long enough to pass this first test?

episodes.title: Class 1-A
episodes.plot: Todoroki's on his own against Seijin High, and Yaoyorozu's group is pitted against Seiai Academy as they and the rest of Class 1-A fight to pass the first test.

episodes.title: RUSH!
episodes.plot: It's down to the final minutes of the first test of the provisional licensing exam and almost half of Class A is still left.

episodes.title: Rescue Exercises
episodes.plot: The second test of the provisional licensing exam has begun, and the hero candidates are suddenly thrust into a rescue operation.

episodes.title: Special Episode - Save the World with Love!
episodes.plot: We take a break from the provisional licensing exam to visit a class held before the summer training camp.

episodes.title: What's the Big Idea?
episodes.plot: The exam nears its end, but Izuku and the other hero candidates must fend off Gang Orca to finish the rescue mission.

episodes.title: A Talk about Your Quirk
episodes.plot: While the U.A. students finish up the provisional licensing exam and get their results, All Might has a talk with All For One.

episodes.title: Deku vs. Kacchan, Part 2
episodes.plot: Following the provisional licensing exam, Izuku tries out his Shoot Style on Bakugo as they have a heart-to-heart through their fight.

episodes.title: A Season for Encounters
episodes.plot: The world has changed for villains and heroes alike in the weeks after All Might's fight with All For One, and the U.A. students start their second semester.

episodes.title: Unrivaled
episodes.plot: The students of Class 1-A learn about work studies from the Big Three. Meanwhile, the villains also prepare their next steps.

episodes.title: Hero Notebook
episodes.plot: Izuku looks back at the events that brought him to U.A. High School and on his path to becoming a hero.

episodes.title: That's the Idea, Ochaco
episodes.plot: As the students and teachers recover from the attack on USJ, Izuku learns why Ochaco wants to become a hero.

episodes.title: Roaring Sports Festival
episodes.plot: The U.A. sports festival begins and all eyes are on the first years as they start their qualifying round-the obstacle course race.

episodes.title: In Their Own Quirky Ways
episodes.plot: The first years try to stand out as they struggle to finish the obstacle course and qualify for a spot in the next round.

episodes.title: Strategy, Strategy, Strategy
episodes.plot: Izuku's having trouble finding a team for the cavalry battle in the next round of the U.A. sports festival. Luckily, he has a plan.

episodes.title: Cavalry Battle Finale
episodes.plot: Fighting it out in the second half of the cavalry battle, does Team Midoriya have what it takes to stay in the top four?

episodes.title: The Boy Born with Everything
episodes.plot: Izuku learns more about Todoroki's past as the first-years head into the final round of the sports festival.

episodes.title: Victory or Defeat
episodes.plot: Izuku is up against Shinso in the first match of the finals, but can he overcome Shinso's Quirk to advance to the next round?

episodes.title: Battle On, Challengers!
episodes.plot: It's one match after another in the first round of the finals tournament. Who will advance to the second round?

episodes.title: Bakugo vs. Uraraka
episodes.plot: Bakugo seems almost villainous when he's up against Uraraka, but she has a plan to keep it from being a one-sided match.

episodes.title: Shoto Todoroki: Origin
episodes.plot: Izuku forces Todoroki to face his past and himself as they square off in the first match of the second round of the finals.

episodes.title: Fight on, Iida
episodes.plot: It's time to see who will make it to the final showdown. Will Iida's Reciproburst be enough to beat Todoroki?

episodes.title: Todoroki vs. Bakugo
episodes.plot: Todoroki and Bakugo, the two finalists begin their fight with one another.

episodes.title: Time to Pick Some Names
episodes.plot: Following their epic debut at the sports festival, it's time for the first-years to pick the most important part of their identities-their hero name!

episodes.title: Bizarre! Gran Torino Appears
episodes.plot: The internships begin! While everyone adjusts to their new tasks, Izuku starts training with Gran Torino, the same man who once taught All Might.

episodes.title: Midoriya and Shigaraki
episodes.plot: The U.A. students are finally starting to get the hang of their internships, but Izuku has much more to learn about One For All.

episodes.title: Hero Killer: Stain vs U.A. Students
episodes.plot: Stain strikes again, and this time some U.A. students are around when it happens. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?

episodes.title: Climax
episodes.plot: It all comes to a head as Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against Stain while the pro heroes in Hosu City fight against the Nomus.

episodes.title: The Aftermath of Hero Killer: Stain
episodes.plot: Stain is finally captured, but now the hero community must deal with the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: Everyone's Internships
episodes.plot: As Izuku, Iida, and Todoroki recover from their fight with Stain, the other members of Class 1-A work hard at their own internships.

episodes.title: Listen Up!! A Tale from the Past
episodes.plot: The students return to their daily lives while All Might has a special history lesson for Izuku. It's time to learn about One For All!

episodes.title: Gear Up for Final Exams
episodes.plot: Finals are coming up, and Class 1-A is going to need more than a cram session. This year, the teachers are changing the practical exams.

episodes.title: Yaoyorozu: Rising
episodes.plot: The exams are turning out to be much more challenging than the students expected. Can any of the teams hold their own against a teacher?

episodes.title: Stripping the Varnish
episodes.plot: As the students of Class 1-A fight in their practical exams, their resolve to become heroes is put to the test.

episodes.title: Katsuki Bakugo: Origin
episodes.plot: Midoriya and Bakugo begin their match with All Might but the two of them have different plans.

episodes.title: Encounter
episodes.plot: The league of villains has two people wanting to join them. UA students go to the mall. When they're at the mall everyone goes off on their own leaving Midoriya by himself where he encounters Tomura Shigaraki.

episodes.title: Izuku Midoriya: Origin
episodes.plot: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

episodes.title: What It Takes to Be a Hero
episodes.plot: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.title: Roaring Muscles
episodes.plot: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

episodes.title: Start Line
episodes.plot: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

episodes.title: What I Can Do For Now
episodes.plot: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

episodes.title: Rage, You Damn Nerd
episodes.plot: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might...

episodes.title: Deku vs. Kacchan
episodes.plot: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

episodes.title: Bakugo's Start Line
episodes.plot: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

episodes.title: Yeah, Just Do Your Best, Iida!
episodes.plot: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

episodes.title: Encounter with the Unknown
episodes.plot: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

episodes.title: Game Over
episodes.plot: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

episodes.title: All Might
episodes.plot: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

episodes.title: Upon Each of Their Hearts
episodes.plot: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.
